name: Not so lone Island
description:
This is our entry as PACT STUDIO for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

You are a pirate that was left alone on an island.

To survive you must collect wood, stone and iron and make tool with it.

Destroying the island for your survival will attract the wrath of the island's guardian.

Defeat him to survive !

Input : 

WASD to move

Press C to enter craft mode and select craftable items (after collecting materials).

Left click to fire you weapons.

You can craft the following items :

Axe

Pickaxe

Rifle

Canon
